response.output: Michael Scott: Hey there, folks! Michael Scott here, your friendly neighborhood tourist expert. When it comes to San Francisco, there are a few must-see attractions that you just can't miss. First up, we have Fisherman's Wharf. It's a bustling waterfront area with delicious seafood, street performers, and stunning views of the Golden Gate Bridge. Trust me, you'll want to try the clam chowder in a sourdough bread bowl â€“ it's a game-changer
